it.polimi.group03.domain.Bead

    Package Description
    it.polimi.group03.domain  
    it.polimi.group03.engine  

    • Uses of Bead in it.polimi.group03.domain

      Fields in it.polimi.group03.domain with type parameters of type Bead 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.List<Bead> Player.beads
      Beads that the player has placed on the board (always 5 beads).
      Methods in it.polimi.group03.domain that return types with arguments of type Bead 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Bead> Player.activeBeads()
      This method will retrieve a list with all the active beads for the player.
      java.util.List<Bead> Player.getBeads() 
      Methods in it.polimi.group03.domain with parameters of type Bead 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Player.addBead(Bead bead)
      This method will add a new bead to the board for the current player, if there is no bead yet, it will initialize the list.

    • Uses of Bead in it.polimi.group03.engine

      Methods in it.polimi.group03.engine that return Bead 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Bead GameBrain.placeBead(GameEngine engine)
      Retrieve a Bead (with the selected position) in which the AI player should place its bead.
      Methods in it.polimi.group03.engine that return types with arguments of type Bead 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private java.util.List<Bead> GameBrain.getBeadsOnBar(java.util.List<Bead> beads, Bar bar)
      Retrieves all the beads present on the selected bar.
      Methods in it.polimi.group03.engine with parameters of type Bead 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      StatusMessage GameEngine.addBeadToBoard(Player player, Bead bead)
      This method adds a new bead for the selected player if and only if it complies with the rules established by the Game.
      StatusMessage GameValidator.validatePlacedBead(Player currentPlayer, Bead newBead)
      This method checks that a player places a bead in an allowable position; in order to do so first checks the number of beads the player has already placed, then checks if the position of the new bead is valid i.e if the new bead is been placed in a holed slot or if there is already a bead in the selected slot.
      Method parameters in it.polimi.group03.engine with type arguments of type Bead 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private java.util.List<Bar> GameBrain.getBarsOfBeads(GameEngine engine, java.util.List<Bead> beads)
      Retrieves all the bars in which the beads provided are present.
      private java.util.List<Bead> GameBrain.getBeadsOnBar(java.util.List<Bead> beads, Bar bar)
      Retrieves all the beads present on the selected bar.
      private int GameBrain.getDefeatsOnBar(GameEngine engine, java.util.List<Bead> beadsOnBar, Bar bar, int level)
      Retrieves the number of fallen beads in the selected bar after "performing" the movement if the level is 0, if no, will retrieve a "strategic" count based on how many RED or BLUE (depending on the level) slots are discovered by moving the selected bar.
